Obtains the beginning iterator of {{tt|zip_transform_view}}. 

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|return /*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;(*this, zip_.begin());}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|return /*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;(*this, zip_.begin());}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{rlp|iterator|Iterator}} to the first element.

===Notes===
{{c|ranges::range&lt;const ranges::zip_view&lt;Views...&gt;&gt;}} is modeled if and only if for every type {{tt|Vi}} in {{tt|Views...}}, {{c|const Vi}} models {{lconcept|range}}.
